ENGINE STARTUP.text: Keep pressing starter button until N1 reaches 60%

ENGINE STARTUP.action: Increase Throttle step by step (Default: Page Up)

ENGINE STARTUP.requirement: When Throttle is max and N2 is stable
ENGINE STARTUP.action: adjust N2 with the Govenor trim increase/decrease. (cyclic)

HOVER.requirement: To stay cantered and avoid drifting
Your stick can be trimmed to a hover position.

TAKE OFF.requirement: engine and transmission gauges (pressure & temperature) are in the green.
Flight instruments all set up properly.

TAKE OFF.text: Once you have performed a hover check and are maintaining a 5 ft hover, you can taxi to the runway.

TAKE OFF.requirement: Push nose slightly forward to start gaining horizontal speed
TAKE OFF.action: No collective input should be required since you are already in a hover state.

TAKE OFF.text: Keep accelerating and you will start generating more and more translational lift, naturally climbing.
Try to maintain an airspeed of 60 kts when climbing

VISUAL LANDING.text: Your approach and landing type will depend on the type of LZ (landing zone) and the type of mission you are doing.

VISUAL LANDING.requirement: Fly towards a reference point on the runway.
Use collective and cyclic input to maintain 80 kts for a descent rate between 300-500 ft/min
Use collective and cyclic input to maintain 60 kts for a descent rate between 300-500 ft/min
Reduce speed to 30 kts when you are 50 ft
VISUAL LANDING.action: Adjust collective to keep a straight trajectory towards your reference point while reducing airspeed.

VISUAL LANDING.requirement: Reach your reference point in a 5 ft hover.
VISUAL LANDING.action: Use your cyclic to come to a full stop

VISUAL LANDING.text: Raise your collective to “cushion” the sudden drop caused by the loss of translational lift (which is caused by the loss of airspeed).

VISUAL LANDING.requirement: Come to a full stop in a 5 ft hover
VISUAL LANDING.action: Slowly reduce collective to safely land on the ground
